summary: A preoperative transgender woman takes an unexpected journey when she learns that she fathered a son, now a teenage runaway hustling on the streets of New York.
cast: Andrea James|Felicity Huffman|Danny Burstein|Maurice Orozco|Elizabeth Peña|Craig Bockhorn|Paul Borghese|Kevin Zegers|Jon Budinoff|Venida Evans|Raynor Scheine|Kate Bayley|Stella Maeve|Teala Dunn|Jim Frangione|Bianca Leigh|Kelly O'Donnell|Calpernia Addams|Sandi Alexander|Melissa Sklarz|Felicia Kittles|David E. Harrison|Lynn Laurino|Forrie J. Smith|Grant Monohon|Graham Greene|Fionnula Flanagan|Burt Young|Carrie Preston|Elayne Stein|Amy Povich|Burton Ellis|Cecy|Matt Young|Barbara Barron|Steve Hurwitz|Richard Poe|Lou Lou|Zero T. Poodle|Wesley Norton|Vince Reign|David Sotelo
title: Transamérica
